lead_paragraph: After a season straight out of the fevered imagination of a movie scriptwriter, Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri is asking his men to seal their "once in a lifetime" Premier League triumph on Sunday with a Hollywood flourish at Old Trafford.

headline.print_headline: Ranieri Wants the Bells to Ring Out for Leicester
headline.main: Ranieri Wants the Bells to Ring Out for Leicester

snippet: After a season straight out of the fevered imagination of a movie scriptwriter, Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri is asking his men to seal their "once in a lifetime" Premier League triumph on Sunday with a Hollywood flourish at Old Trafford....
